comments_data.body:
This issue is caused by the incomplete border check in`check_store_is_busy_on_apply`, which missed the check whether the given store is start from empty.
And this makes the check continuously return `true`, resulting in `store.is_busy == true` in the first start-up time (last for 5 minutes).
